Articles.Content:
Hey guys I downloaded the demo for KSP 2 weeks ago, and now I decide to try it out last Sunday. It is really fun plus I've seen some awesome videos of KSP by Kurtjmac.

Do you guys think I should pay the eighteen dollars to get the game?

Yes of course! I did the same thing, got the demo first and found myself glued to it for weeks. It took some time and thought but when I purchased the full game I was very pleased. Great game for $18 dollars get it.
I'd pay $100 for it, it's so worth it. Plus, buy it now and you avoid paying more in the future

Welcome to the forums, CommanderLOL.

You should get it now because it's in Aplha and the price will keep going up if you don't so you get a great deal now.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!

Hi CommanderLOL, welcome to the community

For def's you should buy KSP, you are missing out on all the new planets and features such as EVA'ing your Kerbals

And $18 is not much, when you consider that all future updates will be free.

Buy it!

You won't find another single player game that'll give you this many hours of fun.
KSP is definately in my list of top 5 games I have ever played.
Thanks for all the overwhelming advice to buy the game. I think I will get the game.
Welcome aboard mate, and yes, 18 is more than worth the many many hours of fun you'll get from KSP! -DR

KSP is definately in my list of top 5 games I have ever played.

More like top 1.0000000001!

I got the demo back when it was the only KSP there was. And then the preimum came out, and my I tried to get my mom to buy it but she said that it wasn't on sale. Then my dad came over and got it.

And I laughed at her face.

But anyway, welcome to the forums. It's really interesting how most of the people who post here are familiar. It's like a family. The dream family you never had.
